entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning late this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
